topics.body:
I had a interesting thought; why is it that 95% of the people who say "I would love to live in nature" or such the sort of people that would starve to death like within a week?

"I would make a wooden cabin and live the life"
". . first question: how would you collect water?"
"Just get it from a lake or such"
*facedesk*
